section1.title: 1. Payment Methods
section1.intro: BCP offers the following payment methods to its business clients:
methods: QR Code Payment (VNPay): Payment via scanning of the VNPayQR code is supported.
PayPal E-wallet: Accepts payment through international credit and debit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express (Amex), and Discover.
Subscription-Based Recurring Payments: Applicable to monthly or annually billed Software as a Service (SaaS) service packages.
section1.security: All transactions are processed through secure payment gateways operated by trusted partners, ensuring the safety and security thereof in compliance with relevant international standards.

section2.title: 2. Payment Terms and Conditions
content: Payment shall be rendered either upon placement of the order or prior to the activation of the services.
For subscription-based packages with recurring billing, the Enterprise shall receive a reminder notification seven (7) calendar days in advance of the scheduled renewal date.

In the event of a payment default, BCP reserves the right to impose a late payment penalty equivalent to five percent (5%) of the total invoiced amount, which shall be applied to the subsequent billing cycle (thirty (30) calendar days following the original due date).

section3.title: 3. Payment Security
section3.intro: BCP is dedicated to safeguarding customer information through the implementation of robust security measures, including but not limited to:
measures: Data Encryption (SSL/TLS): All transaction data is encrypted utilizing Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) and/or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols to ensure its confidentiality and integrity during transmission.

PCI DSS Compliance: The payment processing system adheres to the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) to mitigate the risk of fraudulent activities and maintain a secure environment for payment card information.

section4.title: 4. Subscription Management and Upgrades
section4.content: Businesses can upgrade their service packages at any point in time via the service management portal. Support requests may be submitted through the AI chatbot or by email to connect@bcp.global

section5.title: 5. Legal Compliance
section5.intro: BCP's payment policy adheres to pertinent Vietnamese and international legal requirements, including:
regulations: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR): Protecting customer privacy and data in accordance with its legal framework.
Transparency: Ensuring clear and comprehensive disclosure of all fees and transaction terms.
